tool_description: Blur multiple faces of a photo. Make a request with a URL or Base64Encoded String of a photo and receive a photo with faces blurred. Fast, less code, less load for your application and server. Save much more development time and for your software end-users. This API assists Software .exe applications, Web Apps and Mobile Apps. Built for Appraisers/ Realtors/ Manufacturers/ Alarm/ Security Companies to blur all faces on a photo. Sample: https://ibb.co/M8yrdJ5, https://ibb.co/0mJWLbM
name: BlurFacesTool
title: BlurFacesTool

api_list.name: Blur Multiple Faces
api_list.description: Blur Multiple Faces of a photo URL or base64string
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://blurfacestool.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/blurfacetool/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "blurfacestool.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: blurfaces
api_list.description: Post an image URL or Base64 with faces in the photo and get the same photo with blur faces.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://blurfacestool.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/blurfacetool/client.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "blurfacestool.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
